pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Yi1 liao2 Fu2 wu4 Ti3 xi4
Guo2 ji4 Yi1 liao2 Zhong1 xin1

definition: New Rural Cooperative Medical Scheme/abbr. to 新農合|新农合
pinyin: Xin1 xing2 Nong2 cun1 He2 zuo4 Yi1 liao2

sentences.english: Smart software can also reduce medical errors.
sentences.chinese: 高智能的軟體也可以減少醫療疏失。

sentences.english: Medical service contract is a kind of contract for commission.
sentences.chinese: 醫療服務合同具有委託合同的基本屬性。

sentences.english: The BLOs provide short-term shelter and can provide medical care.
sentences.chinese: 這些邊境聯絡處提供短期的庇護和醫療。

sentences.english: The iPATH Telemedicine Platform is an open-source software.
sentences.chinese: iPATH遠程醫療平臺是一種開源軟件。

sentences.english: Progress in health care and education reform.
sentences.chinese: 醫療衛生和教育改革的進展。

sentences.english: A novel infantile enemator belongs to the technical field of medical equipment.
sentences.chinese: 新型小兒灌腸器，屬於醫療用具技術領域。

sentences.english: Disclosed is a novel bone peg, belonging to medical appliance technical field.
sentences.chinese: 新型骨釘，屬於醫療用具技術領域。

sentences.english: The use of radiation sources in medical and other applications is widespread throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 如今世界各地普遍在醫療和其它應用中使用放射源。

sentences.english: Prescription drugs represent only about one-tenth of all health care spending in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 處方藥僅佔美國醫療保健費用的十分之一。

sentences.english: What you are seeing is organized medical crime.
sentences.chinese: 你所看到的是有組織的醫療犯罪。

sentences.english: The shortcomings of China’s medical system are hardly limited to cosmetic and plastic surgery.
sentences.chinese: 中國醫療系統的弊病絕不僅僅侷限於美容整形外科。

sentences.english: Tele-home-care is a typical application of M2M technology.
sentences.chinese: 電子家庭醫療是M2M技術應用到的一個典型。

sentences.english: Yesterday, the new family was discharged from the St Charles Medical Centre in Bend, Oregon.
sentences.chinese: 昨天全家從俄勒岡州本德市聖查理醫療中心出院。

sentences.english: The participants of the VIP card membership must fill in the following information. (If applicant requires a VIP card, please also fill in the below section).
sentences.chinese: 專匯醫療貴賓卡會籍參加者必須填妥以下資料。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the in-patient satisfaction of medical service.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解住院病人對醫療服務的滿意情況。

sentences.english: Health promotion activities conducted by health providers are not enough.
sentences.chinese: 醫療服務供給方健康促進工作不夠。

definition: to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
